column4: Hello! Could someone please tell me how to get rid of the animation for minimising windows in Gnome?

if you want to disable all Compiz stuff System / Preferences / Appearance - Visual Effect tab, set to none.  If you only want to get rid of the minimizing, you might need to use ccsm (perhaps simple-ccsm as well, i've never played with it though)
I have the effects set to none, but still get an annoying, black rectangle shrinking towards the bottom left corner
oh that's "just" gnome then, don't know how to make any affect on that, sorry
